column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The 3 of us started with a family size spinach salad with chicken. The salad was good
column2: strawberries were ripe but there was not enough of them. Also not enough chicken in my opinion. Thankfully the same was the case with the dressing
column3: but I hate salads that are swimming in dressing. The salad would have served 4-5
column4: so we probably should have done the regular size.
